price: Gara Isaatti deebi’oo ta’uun (diinii Isaa qabadhaa); Isa sodaadhaa. Salaatas (haqaan) sagadaa. Mushrikoota irraa hin ta’inaa.
arabic: ۞ مُنِيبِينَ إِلَيۡهِ وَٱتَّقُوهُ وَأَقِيمُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَلَا تَكُونُواْ مِنَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: munībīna ilayhi wa-ittaqūhu wa-aqīmū al-ṣalata walā takūnū mina al-mush'rikīna
